scenes.visual_prompt: A matte black high-tech diagnostic device, sleek design with a glowing blue screen displaying complex data, held in a gloved hand. Cinematic three-point lighting, medium close-up, centered composition.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow dolly push-in, gradually revealing the device's screen details.

scenes.visual_prompt: The same matte black high-tech diagnostic device, now actively emitting a focused blue beam, scanning a miniature circuit board with intricate components. Soft key light, slightly wider shot revealing the device's ergonomic form and focused beam, maintaining hero framing.
scenes.audio_prompt: Gentle, rhythmic beeps of diagnostic scanning.
scenes.motion_prompt: Subtle Steadicam drift to the side, emphasizing the scanning process.
